verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, because there is no <S%H571>truth<s%>, nor <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, nor <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

There is nought but <S%H422>swearing<s%> and breaking <S%H3584>faith<s%>, and <S%H7523>killing<s%>, and <S%H1589>stealing<s%>, and committing <S%H5003>adultery<s%>; they break <S%H6555>out<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Therefore shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and every one that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein shall <S%H535>languish<s%>, with the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; <S%H1709>yea<s%>, the fishes of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> also shall be taken <S%H622>away<s%>.
Yet let no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%>, neither let any man <S%H3198>reprove<s%>; <S%H376><s%> for thy <S%H5971>people<s%> are as they that <S%H7378>strive<s%> with the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> also shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> with thee in the <S%H3915>night<s%>; and I will <S%H1820>destroy<s%> thy <S%H517>mother<s%>.

My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1820>destroyed<s%> for lack of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: because thou hast <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, I will also <S%H3988>reject<s%> <S%H3547>thee<s%>, that thou shalt be no priest to <S%H7911>me<s%>: seeing thou hast forgotten the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>, I also will <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%>.
As they were <S%H7230>multiplied<s%>, so they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H4171>me<s%>: I will change their <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
They <S%H398>feed<s%> on the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H5375>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart<s%> on their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
And it shall <S%H5971>be<s%>, like people, like <S%H3548>priest<s%>; and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and will <S%H7725>requite<s%> them their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, and not have <S%H7646>enough<s%>; they shall play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and shall not <S%H6555>increase<s%>; because they have left <S%H5800>off<s%> taking <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Whoredom <S%H2184><s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> take <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.

My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> counsel at their <S%H6086>stock<s%>, and their <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5046>declareth<s%> unto <S%H7307>them<s%>; for the spirit of <S%H2183>whoredom<s%> hath caused them to <S%H8582>err<s%>, and they have played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, departing from under their <S%H430>God<s%>.

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> upon the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, under <S%H437>oaks<s%> and <S%H3839>poplars<s%> and <S%H424>terebinths<s%>, because the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> thereof is <S%H2896>good<s%>: therefore your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and your <S%H3618>brides<s%> commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>.

I will not <S%H6485>punish<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> when they play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, nor your <S%H3618>brides<s%> when they commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>; for the men themselves go <S%H6504>apart<s%> with <S%H2181>harlots<s%>, and they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> with the <S%H6948>prostitutes<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that doth not <S%H995>understand<s%> shall be <S%H3832>overthrown<s%>.

Though <S%H3478>thou<s%>, Israel, play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, yet let not <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H816>offend<s%>; and <S%H935>come<s%> not ye unto <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, neither go ye <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1007>Beth-aven<s%>, nor <S%H7650>swear<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>.

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath behaved himself <S%H5637>stubbornly<s%>, like a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> <S%H6510>heifer<s%>: now will <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> them as a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> in a large <S%H4800>place<s%>.
Their <S%H5435>drink<s%> is become <S%H5493>sour<s%>; they play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H2181>continually<s%>; her <S%H4043>rulers<s%> <S%H3051>dearly<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7036>shame<s%>.
The <S%H7307>wind<s%> hath wrapped her <S%H6887>up<s%> in its <S%H3671>wings<s%>; and they shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> because of their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>.
